subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Rangers have avoided salary arbitration with forward Mats Zuccarello, a restricted free agent, agreeing to terms with him on a one-year, $3.5 million contract.
snippet: The Rangers have avoided salary arbitration with forward Mats Zuccarello, a restricted free agent, agreeing to terms with him on a one-year, $3.5 million contract.
